name: MORE
description:
MORE is an Adventure game where you shall listen and explore.

(Full-Screen Recommended)

-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Made in 48h(14h) for the Ludum Dare 38 Compo by Alberto "_beta" Mellado.

-----------------------

Written in C# on Unity.

Tools:

Unity

Adobe Photoshop

Audacity

Maya

-----------------------

Directions:

Movement -> WAD

Boost-> SPACE

------------------------

If you do not know what to do:

Bring asteroids to the planet, then worlds.

------------------------

Contact:

albertomelladoc@gmail.com

-----------------------

This was my 5th Ludum Dare entry and I am happy with the result. I think its a nice game for the time and energy I had.

Hope you enjoy it.

-----------------------
